SEARCH
Package com.example.sprite.Controllers

Class DatabaseService

java.lang.Object
com.example.sprite.Controllers.DatabaseService
public class DatabaseService extends Object
DatabaseService provides an abstraction layer for all Firestore database operations.

This service handles CRUD operations for users, events, waiting lists, and notifications, as well as optional push notifications via Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM).

Each operation returns results asynchronously using Firestore's OnCompleteListener interface.

      Parameters:

      listener - Callback invoked when the delete operation completes, providing success or failure information.
